item.description:
Come to The Charlesmark Hotel Lounge to chat over drinks!  From there we will be head out to dance the night away!! Please feel free to bring friends, the more the merrier...

DETAILS: Come hang out The Charlesmark Hotel (655 Boylston St) for a bit so we can all meet and hang out.  We will likely be in the back lounge of the bar.  Its a small venue with lots of seating, so should be nice to relax for a bit before a night of dancing!  Around 10, we will head over to a dance venue (to be determined) to beat lines.  Try to get to Charlesmark before 10 to ensure you dont miss us, but if you arrive late or can't find the group call or text my cell (508-340-8635).  There should be no cover at Charlesmark, but might be at the dance venue around $10-15.

These are upscale venues, please dress appropriately.  Closest T stops are Copley and Back Bay.

Hope to see you there!! -Ashley
item.how_to_find_us: My profile picture should give you an idea of who to look for, and my cell is 508-340-8635.

group.name: The Boston Night Life Meetup Group

item.name: Drinks/Martinis at Charlesmark Hotel & Dancing! - Friday Mar 11
